Directly to the source. Consumer goods, organic food and whatever you need.

ALL FROM SERBIA AND REGION

We connect you with business opportunities from Serbia and surrounding region.

We maintain a network of businesses in and around Serbia.

They do a superb job and deserve to go international, but too often lack the resources or don’t know how. But we do! We are not resellers: we connect suppliers and buyers directly and rapidly, spicing it up with long-term consulting should the partners need that.

We are not resellers.

we connect suppliers and buyers directly and rapidly, spicing it up with long-term consulting should the partners need that.

You’d be amazed at the reams of excellence that stays below the radar of international markets. Think impeccable local craftsmanship, fresh organic produce made in backyards, or even cutting-edge software made by urban hackers.

In other words: hidden opportunities. The kind usually found where nobody knew or cared to look. Until someone discovers these businesses, potential game-changing, win-win partnerships keep going to waste.

One of such places is our home, Serbia, and the surrounding countries that once made up Yugoslavia (Slovenia, Croatia, Bosnia and Herzegovina, Montenegro, Macedonia).

With years of experience and networking, we have these little known transition markets at our fingertips, and we deliver their potential into your hands. We find you the right contact at the right time, and you guys do the rest. And if there are problems, or you need extra advice, we’re always here to help!

Partner Matching

FMCG, food and organic food, but also practically anything else. You ask, we find the right person, and you guys do the rest.

Investment Opportunities

You wouldn’t believe what some businesses around here could do with a bit of capital. Which is too often unavailable here.

Sales Support and Project Management

Whatever international project you’re up to, we can give you a hand with it. Especially if it involves this part of the world.

Consulting and Cross-Border

We match happy partners, but also lead them step-by-step. Especially in the difficult setting of cross-border cooperation.

1

No Fear of Commitment.

Out there, there’s plethora of middlemen who run after the quick buck, charging fat margins for connecting people they merrily forget about afterwards. Not us. We build mutually beneficial long-term relationships between our clients, always staying around as advisers, controllers and old friends.

2

All from Serbia.

Our country is our home, our passion, our trade. We have worked for years in different industries and learned to spot the best opportunities. We’ve learned that there is plethora of excellence in Serbia: it’s just still largely ignored abroad because of bad marketing, low country reputation and lack of government support.

3

Our Guys Know Us.

It’s not all about who you know, it’s also about who knows you. Our contacts are not just names stashed in a database: they are real people that we know and interact with personally. Only this way we can vouch for opportunity being really valuable.

4

Sure, We Got It!

Our strength derives from our contacts and prior experience, and we got oodles. We are committed to always finding our clients the right contacts and the right advice. Blazing-fast, intelligently, and with passion.

5

We Know Knowledge.

We have years of consulting, marketing, entrepreneurship and salesmanship in our luggage. We don’t just match partners, we lead them step-by-step in the process of company formation, marketing, legal procedures. ConsultUs is a one-stop shop for everything Serbia has to offer – how much you need is up to you.

6

There’s a Moral to the Story

There is a greater good behind our actions. By doing what we do, we give voice to our country and the people there, who are struggling with an undeserved lack of recognition. In our experience, the right information is both efficient and ethical.

A pleasure to meet you!
